name: Kublit
description: Get ready for intense action and thrilling puzzle-solving with Kublit from 69 Studios! As a new member of a notorious piracy group, your mission is to hunt down valuable serial keys by taking out pesky kublits that stand in your way. Upgrade your skills and gear to become faster, stronger, and more efficient as you rack up the highest score in the game. Can you outperform your rivals and rack up the highest score? Play Kublit now and find out!
